structure.unit: ARTICLE III. DADE COUNTY VESSEL MOORING CODE

law.catch_line: Mooring to bank except where bulkhead prohibited.

text.section:
Sec. 7-33. Mooring to bank except where bulkhead prohibited.
No vessel shall be moored to the bank or shore unless the major portion of the moored vessel lies adjacent to a bulkhead, seawall, dock or pier, or the natural condition of the bank is solid and comparable to concrete bulkheading, and the depth of the water at mean low water along the entire length of the vessel is equal to the draft of the vessel.
